page.title: 13SHOPPING: Lepton/Almondbury
page.content: {Lepton}is a small village. We asked 20 local people about their shopping habits. We wanted to find out where and how often they shopped. {Use of village shops:} Daily 6 Weekly 10 Sometimes 5. {Huddersfield shops:} Daily 0 Weekly 16 Sometimes 4. {Other centres:}Regularly 1 Sometimes 17 Never 2. Of these,{Wakefield}(14) and{Leeds}(7) were used by most people Half of the shoppers in{Almondbury} use local shops several times a week. The supermarket and Post Office are used most regularly, followed by the grocer, greengrocer, butcher, baker and chemist. The fish and chip shop is patronised by 50% of the sample, but the DIY store is little used. Because the survey was done in the early afternoon, the people we interviewed were mostly housewives or pensioners.
